content.query:
--polybase
-- external metadata object
-- external table --> round robin
 
-- moving data from external table to round robin table, there are 2 ways; 1.INSERT INTO, 2.CTAS

--CTAS way of loading
--~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

-- Replace SUFFIX with the lab workspace id. (rs6nlej)
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE ABSS
WITH
( TYPE = HADOOP,
    LOCATION = 'abfss://wwi-02@asadatalakers6nlej.dfs.core.windows.net'
);


CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [ParquetFormat]
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
    DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
)
GO

CREATE SCHEMA [wwi_external];
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [wwi_external].Sales
    (
        [TransactionId] [nvarchar](36)  NOT NULL,
        [CustomerId] [int]  NOT NULL,
        [ProductId] [smallint]  NOT NULL,
        [Quantity] [smallint]  NOT NULL,
        [Price] [decimal](9,2)  NOT NULL,
        [TotalAmount] [decimal](9,2)  NOT NULL,
        [TransactionDate] [int]  NOT NULL,
        [ProfitAmount] [decimal](9,2)  NOT NULL,
        [Hour] [tinyint]  NOT NULL,
        [Minute] [tinyint]  NOT NULL,
        [StoreId] [smallint]  NOT NULL
    )
WITH
    (
        LOCATION = '/sale-small/Year=2019',  
        DATA_SOURCE = ABSS,
        FILE_FORMAT = [ParquetFormat]  
    )  
GO


---load external table into round robin table
create schema wwi_staging;


create table [wwi_staging].[SaleHeap] 
with
(
    DISTRIBUTION=ROUND_ROBIN, --- its must needed
    HEAP
)AS
select * from [wwi_external].Sales;

--Now we can create dimension & facts as per our need
create table dimension_from_qry
with
(
    DISTRIBUTION=REPLICATE, --- its must needed
    clustered COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)as
SELECT [CustomerId]
,[ProductId]
,[Quantity]
 FROM [wwi_staging].[SaleHeap];


create table dimension_from_qry_hash
with
(
    DISTRIBUTION=HASH(CustomerId), --- its must needed
    clustered COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)as
SELECT [CustomerId]
,[ProductId]
,[Quantity]
 FROM [wwi_staging].[SaleHeap];



-- INSERT INTO loading method
--~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
CREATE TABLE [wwi_staging].[SaleHeapEarly]
( 
    [TransactionId] [uniqueidentifier]  NOT NULL,
    [CustomerId] [int]  NOT NULL,
    [ProductId] [smallint]  NOT NULL,
    [Quantity] [smallint]  NOT NULL,
    [Price] [decimal](9,2)  NOT NULL,
    [TotalAmount] [decimal](9,2)  NOT NULL,
    [TransactionDate] [int]  NOT NULL,
    [ProfitAmount] [decimal](9,2)  NOT NULL,
    [Hour] [tinyint]  NOT NULL,
    [Minute] [tinyint]  NOT NULL,
    [StoreId] [smallint]  NOT NULL
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    HEAP
);


INSERT INTO [wwi_staging].[SaleHeapEarly]
SELECT * FROM [wwi_external].Sales;



--###########################################################
-- COPY INTO


CREATE TABLE [wwi_staging].[SaleHeapEarlyCOPYINTO]
( 
    [TransactionId] [uniqueidentifier]  NOT NULL,
    [CustomerId] [int]  NOT NULL,
    [ProductId] [smallint]  NOT NULL,
    [Quantity] [smallint]  NOT NULL,
    [Price] [decimal](9,2)  NOT NULL,
    [TotalAmount] [decimal](9,2)  NOT NULL,
    [TransactionDate] [int]  NOT NULL,
    [ProfitAmount] [decimal](9,2)  NOT NULL,
    [Hour] [tinyint]  NOT NULL,
    [Minute] [tinyint]  NOT NULL,
    [StoreId] [smallint]  NOT NULL
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    HEAP
);




COPY INTO [wwi_staging].[SaleHeapEarlyCOPYINTO]
FROM 'https://asadatalakers6nlej.dfs.core.windows.net/wwi-02/sale-small/Year=2019'
WITH (
    FILE_TYPE = 'PARQUET',
    COMPRESSION = 'SNAPPY'
)
GO
